main event: A collection of documents related to Project Blue Book discusses various UFO sightings and the findings of the USAF Scientific Advisory Board in March 1966.
interesting points: Doctor J. Allen Hynek, the scientific consultant to Project Blue Book, was involved alongside other significant scientists such as Dr. Carl Sagan., The agenda for the Ad Hoc Committee on UFOs included discussions of the Air Force problem and case histories., The Air Force reported that over 10,000 sightings have been investigated since 1947 with only 646 remaining unidentified., NICAP, the National Investigations Committee on Aerial Phenomena, urged an investigation into the public's reports and criticized the Air Force for its treatment of witnesses., The documents highlighted varying accounts of UFO sightings across multiple states, including reports from credible witnesses like sheriff deputies and engineers.
witness description: individuals including a deputy sheriff and various engineers
